author: srimanob
body:
#### PR description:
As foreseen on move relvals to D88 in 12_3_0_pre5, this PR adds D88 workflows to the short matrix. We then can decide to remove D86 (with this PR), and D77 (maybe later after migration).

Proposal https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/36832 can be integrated into this PR if agreed.

#### PR validation:
-

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
Not a backport, and no need of backport
title: [Not to merge at the moment] Add D88 to the short matrix
